data.client_settings: Discord Developer Panel - was told to report it in desktop bugs.
data.actual_result: The  with transparency is for whatever reason massively downscaled and never rendered larger than 64x64 by Discord
data.expected_result: It should act the same as it does for a , retain quality / resolution and not look pixelated
data.short_description: Uploading a .png avatar as Bot Avatar in new Dev Panel results in extremely pixelated 64x64 avatar.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to developer panel - Create or edit a bot - Upload a png avatar- Watch as it completely wrecks the quality of your image and only renders it as 64x64 everywhere
